biotools.summary:
DeepRiPP integrates multiomics data to automate discovery of novel ribosomally synthesized natural products.

Deepginsen is a lantipeptide that is genomically encoded distantly from its modification enzymes and discovered directly as a result of DeepRiPP within the genome and metabolome of Flavobacterium ginsengiterrae JCM 17337.

bioschemas.name: DeepRiPP
